'''''Minecraft: Chase the Skies (Original Game Soundtrack)''''', also known as '''''Minecraft: Game Drop 2 - 2025 (Original Game Soundtrack)''''' on some platforms, is the soundtrack released as part of [[Chase the Skies]]. It is the first soundtrack for ''[[Minecraft]]'' by [[Amos Roddy]].
